item.title: Jp add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am not young enough to know everything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I like persons better than principles, and I like persons with no principles better than anything else in the world." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A good friend will always stab you in the front." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "No good deed goes unpunished." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jp add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
item.description: "The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it." -- Neil deGrasse Tyson

item.title: Jp add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
item.description: "Not only do we live among the stars, the stars live within us." -- Neil deGrasse Tyson

item.title: Jp add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
item.description: "The atoms of our bodies are traceable to stars that manufactured them in their cores and exploded these enriched ingredients across our galaxy, billions of years ago. For this reason, we are biologically connected to every other living thing in the world. We are chemically connected to all molecules on Earth. And we are atomically connected to all atoms in the universe. We are not figuratively, but literally stardust." -- Neil deGrasse Tyson
